title: Node1
body:
date: Hey Chris, how are you? How did you find Friday's test?
player: It was Okay...
-> I found the maths hard
    player: There were so many numbers. 
    player: Every I see a number I've never seen before.
    <<set $somanynumbers to true>>
-> I think I did alright.
    player: I'm not sure.

player: How did you find it?
date: I find the formulas quite tough.
<<if $somanynumbers is true>>
date: You're right though, there are so many numbers.
date: Yeah, 14 that's a new one.
<<endif>>
date: Should we sit down and order something?
